title: Govt response to Smith/Traynor review (Ministry of Justice of New Zealand)
text: ( Source : Ministry of Justice of New Zealand ) Justice Minister Amy Adams and Corrections Minister Peseta Sam Lotu-Iiga have responded to the independent inquiry into matters surrounding the escape of Phillip Smith /Traynor. The inquiry noted
